creditline: Gift of Dr. Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
description: indigo hanging with blue and off-white design; off-white lines and filled spaces form design of off-white lotus flowers and buds rising out of water on stalks; indigo and blue circular flowers in water and rising on off-white stalks; design in lower half of hanging with upper half plain indigo; nine tab loops across top hem for hanging; tsutsugaki technique
title: Temple hanging (noren)
